channel.title: DeviationX || Spawn-PK || VPS hosted - 24/7!
channel.description:
[ul][CENTER][COLOR="red"][SIZE=5][url=http://www.deviationx.org]Click here to go directly to the website![/url][/SIZE][/COLOR]
--DeviationX.org--
[SIZE=3]A brand new server with a lot of spirit driving it.
Spawn-PK, the higher your kill count, the better items you can wield! Pk orientated gameplay! Includes lots of bosses to choose from and plenty of minigames! Have tons of fun in your favourite gear!
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cPGnRjuPy4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cPGnRjuPy4[/url] [/SIZE] [spoiler=Features][LIST=1] [*]Spawn-PK [*]Unique content - custom items [*]24/7 VPS hosted [*]Bossing [*]Boss pets [*]Gambling [*]Skilling [*]Pking [*]Full fight caves [*]Lots of mini-games including castle wars[/ul]
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media][img]https://i.gyazo.com/9353876d7e2983106859edfa84c81c23.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/d01762779e7928197a5b08aa66af9287.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="red"]More media to be uploaded soon[/COLOR][/B] [/spoiler][/CENTER]
